name: event_id
description: Unique shotspotter event identifier.

name: event_time
description: Timestamp of when shotspotter event was recorded. (CST)

name: event_date
description: Date on which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: event_year
description: Year on which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: event_month
description: Month on which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: event_day_of_month
description: Day of the month on which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: event_day_of_week
description: Day of the week on which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: day_type
description: Flag indicating whether event took place on weekday or weekend.

name: hour_of_day
description: Hour of day during which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: hour_category
description: Flag which indicates what time of the day event was recorded (morning|afternoon|evening, etc.).

name: event_type
description: Description of type of shotspotter event (i.e., shots fired, fireworks, etc.).

name: rounds_fired
description: Number of rounds fired during shotspotter event.

name: neighbourhood
description: Name of the neighbourhood in which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: block
description: The block number and street name on which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: ward
description: The police ward in which the shotspotter event was recorded.

name: district
description: The city district in which the shotspotter event took place.

name: illinois_house_district
description: The state house district in which the shotspotter event was recorded.

name: illinois_senate_district
description: The state senate district in which the shotspotter event was recorded.

name: zip_code
description: The zip code for the area in which shotspotter event was recorded.

name: latitude
description: The latitude corresponding to the recorded shotspotter event.

name: longitude
description: The longitude corresponding to the recorded shotspotter event.

name: homicides
description: The number of homicides (if any) associated with the recorded shotspotter event.

name: is_homicide
description: A flag indicating whether or not the recorded shotspotter event led to a homicide.
